name: New Jurisdictions for Longevity and Medical Innovation - Day 1, part 1
description: The video discusses the concept of pharmaceutical freedom and the right of patients to self-medicate. The speaker argues against medical paternalism and the FDA's regulations, citing examples of drugs that were denied approval and caused harm, as well as drugs that were approved too late and resulted in preventable deaths. The speaker also discusses the economic arguments and the impact of regulations on entrepreneurship and innovation in the pharmaceutical industry. The video uses movie clips and real-life examples to illustrate the flaws in the current regulatory paradigm and the need for a more balanced approach to pharmaceutical regulation.
